This project is led by Dr. [**Grace Tompkins**](https://grcetmpk.github.io/), Assistant Professor of Teaching in the Department of Statistics at the University of British Columbia, situated on the traditional, ancestral, and unceded territory of the xʷməθkʷəy̓əm (Musqueam) people. She is settler of English, Irish, and French descent who was born and raised in Mi'kma'ki (Nova Scotia). Grace is passionate about inclusive statistics and data science education.
